ygData.subject: Re: [[EQ_Necromancer] Vampire Embrace Spell]
ygData.msgSnippet: Vampric Embrace  is a more powerful version of the grim aura spell that only lasts for about 90 seconds. I have tested this spell extensivly and have never
ygData.messageBody:
Vampric Embrace is a more powerful version of the grim aura spell
that only lasts for about 90 seconds. I have tested this spell extensivly
and have never gotten a "lifetap type" effect from the spell
all it does is increase your attack rating by 15.
IMHO - this spell would be great for a shadowknight but as
a necro. dont waste your mana.
Trinnes (level 15 human necro)
